description: Wafels & Dinges is a must on every foodie's bucket list. This acclaimed truck sells authentic Brussels (thin & crispy) and Liege (soft & chewy) wafels, all so delicious, any time of day. To compliment these warm decadent treats, they provide a wide variety of "dinges", or toppings ranging from savory to sweet. Their selection includes BBQ Pork and Chile Con Carne, to Belgian chocolate fudge, or speculoos spread and whipped cream- this combination actually led to Wafels & Dinges’ victory over Bobby Flay when he attempted to throw down with Thomas Degeest (founder, chef, Wafel Master). To get some insight into Thomas Degeest and how his truck came to be, as well as the definition (and proper pronunciation) of "Dinges," check out the Roaming Hunger blog post here:http://roaminghunger.com/blog/4331/featured-food-truck-wafel-dinges
name: Wafels & Dinges
